KEY.name: fullname
KEY.VALUE: Sustainable Farming Excellence from Integrated Pest Management to Post

KEY.name: displayname
KEY.VALUE: Sustainable Farming Excellence from Integrated Pest Management to Post

KEY.name: summary
KEY.VALUE: Empowering Extensionists for Sustainable Farming Excellence. This comprehensive course equips extensionists with the knowledge and confidence to train and advise growers on the integrated approach of Integrated Pest Management (IPM) and Post Harvest Loss Management (PHLM). Discover the benefits of IPM and learn how to implement it effectively in the field. The course goes beyond by providing a holistic strategy for adapting this knowledge to specific crops in diverse countries and regions, collaborating closely with local extension services and experts. Arm yourself with the skills to ensure a thriving harvest from pest control to post-harvest preservation.

KEY.name: fullname
KEY.VALUE: Improving the Yield of Cowpea in Nigeria

KEY.name: displayname
KEY.VALUE: Improving the Yield of Cowpea in Nigeria

KEY.name: summary
KEY.VALUE: This self-paced course is designed to help you increase cowpea production yields by understanding the optimal climate, soil conditions, and best farming practices. Through practical insights and guidance, you will learn how to apply proven techniques to enhance cowpea cultivation and achieve better results.

KEY.name: summary
KEY.VALUE: This concise course introduces learners to the essential principles and practices of successful beetroot production. From site selection and soil preparation to planting, crop maintenance, and harvesting, participants gain a clear, step-by-step understanding of the beetroot farming cycle. The course emphasizes the importance of good agronomic practices, pest and disease management, and post-harvest handling. Designed for extension agents, farmers, and agripreneurs, it aims to equip learners with the practical knowledge and confidence needed to enhance productivity and profitability in beetroot cultivation across various regions.

KEY.name: summary
KEY.VALUE: Learn the essentials of lettuce farmingfrom seed selection and cultivation to pest control, harvesting, and storage. Gain practical skills to grow lettuce profitably and sustainably.

KEY.name: summary
KEY.VALUE: This course provides a comprehensive guide to cabbage production, from seed to market. Learners will gain knowledge of the crops physical characteristics, nutritional value, and diverse varieties. The modules cover essential aspects such as climatic and soil requirements, fertilizer management, pest and disease control, and harvesting techniques. In addition, learners will explore best practices in post-harvest handling, storage, and value addition to maximize profitability and reduce losses. Through assessments, the course equips learners with the technical skills and practical know-how needed for successful cabbage farming, whether at a subsistence or commercial scale.
